Question in English: Calculate the general solution of the differential equation ${y}^{(5)} -{y}^{(4)} =0$.
Answer: y为关于x的任意5次及以下的多项式函数

Question in Chinese: 计算微分方程的通解$y\log_{e}{y} \mathrm{d}x+  \left ( x- \log_{e}{y}  \right ) \mathrm{d}y =0$.
Question in English: Calculate the general solution of the differential equation $y\log_{e}{y} \mathrm{d}x+  \left ( x- \log_{e}{y}  \right ) \mathrm{d}y =0$.
Calculate the general solution of the differential equation ${y}'' -3{y}' +2y=xe^{2x} $.

Question in Chinese: 计算微分方程的通解$\left ( x-4 \right ) y^{4} \mathrm{d}x -x^{3} \left ( y^{2} -3 \right ) \mathrm{d}y =0$.
Question in English: Calculate the general solution of the differential equation $\left ( x-4 \right ) y^{4} \mathrm{d}x -x^{3} \left ( y^{2} -3 \right ) \mathrm{d}y =0$.
Calculate the general solution of the differential equation ${s}'' =-0.2$.
